attributes.action: Create a new Local Authority Statutory Duty to provide transport to school to all children in the UK going to Denominational Schools to make it Equal to other children in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FACT:Councils all over the UK are forcing the transport home to school upon parents who choose to send their children to a Denoninational school instead of a Council school. In doing this, The Councils are directly imposing financial hardship for many families in the UK.  

FACT: Local Authorities do not have a statutory duty to provide school transport if the child does not go to a Council school.
MY PROPOSAL: The Local Authorities must have responsibility for home to school transport to all UK children, regardless if a child goes to a Council school or to a Denominational school.  Councils must do all they can to CREATE SCHOOL BUSES where walking and cycling is not safe.
All children should have a right to access their school.

Please sign this Petition in support.

Please help in the name of Diversity and Equality.
